name: exam-scheduler
description: A browser-based exam scheduling tool powered by WebAssembly

scripts.build:wasm: cd go && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o ../web/public/main.wasm ./cmd/wasm
scripts.build:wasm:windows: cd go && set GOOS=js&& set GOARCH=wasm&& go build -o ../web/public/main.wasm ./cmd/wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:web
scripts.build:windows: npm run build:wasm:windows && npm run build:web
scripts.dev: npm run build:wasm && npm run dev:web
scripts.dev:windows: npm run build:wasm:windows && npm run dev:web
scripts.test: npm run test:go && npm run lint:web
scripts.clean: cd web && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../go && go clean -cache
scripts.clean:windows: cd web && rmdir /s /q dist node_modules 2>nul & cd ../go && go clean -cache
scripts.setup: npm run install:web && npm run copy:wasm-exec && npm run build:wasm
scripts.setup:windows: npm run install:web && npm run copy:wasm-exec:windows && npm run build:wasm:windows
